content.rendered:
Insurance Inspection Service

Click Here for a Free Quotation

Insurance Inspection Service for Insurers, Brokers, and H&S Consultants

Keeping Your Clients Safe and Compliant...

Plant and Safety Limited are national providers for Engineering Testing, Inspection, and Certification services on a wide range of includes Lifting Equipment and Accessories, Work Equipment, Mobile Plant Equipment, Access Equipment, Pressure Systems, Local Exhaust Ventilation, Passenger and Goods Lifts, Industrial Doors, Electrical Systems and Equipment, and Portable Electrical Equipment. 

Our insurance inspection service for brokers, insurers, and Health & Safety Consultants provides a wide range of compliance services to keep your customer-owned equipment both safe and compliant with the relevant regulations, legislation, and standards. 

Your Challenges

As an insurance broker, you can add value to your customers by supporting them with their statutory engineering inspection requirements.  Due to the complex and fast-paced environment in which your customers operate, it is crucial to ensure that their equipment is safe and compliant with the relevant regulations, legislation, and standards. 

Our team of industry experts build and maintain strong working relationships with insurance brokers to deliver a fully managed compliance service. Our planning team works with the equipment owner to carefully plan and co-ordinate inspections based on due dates to ensure the highest standards of compliance. 

Click Here for a Free Quotation

How We Can Support You

Plant and Safety are industry experts in providing Statutory Engineering Inspection Services, and we can support your requirements by

  • Providing Annual Quotations
  • Planning and Co-ordinating your customer’s inspection requirements 
  • Real-time reporting to minimise reporting delays 
  • Providing your customer with online access to our industry-leading reporting systems
  • Instant overview of compliance status at customer, site, and item level 
  • Providing Account Management 
  • Working Efficiently and Effectively to maintain competitive pricing 
  • Maintaining Accreditations, Industry Memberships, and High Standards
Click Here for a Free Quotation

Our Statutory Inspection Services for Insurance Brokers

 Lifting Equipment and Lifting Accessories

Find Out More About This Service

Find Out More About This Service

Find Out More About This Service

Electrical Testing Services

Fixed Wiring (EICR), Fixed Plant, and PAT

Find Out More About This Service

WHY CHOOSE PLANT AND SAFETY?


Industry Experts

Our team has extensive experience in providing Testing, Inspection, Certification, and Training Services across all sectors within the UK. Our team of passionate industry experts work closely with our customers to keep their equipment and their people both safe and compliant


Quality Assurance

All of our services are backed by an extensive list of nationally recognised Accreditations and Industry Body Memberships. Our Accreditations and Memberships include ISO 9001, ISO 14001, OHSAS 18001, NPORS, CHAS, Safecontractor, Safe PQQ, ROSPA, and the British Safety Council


National Service Provider

Plant and Safety are a national provider of Testing, Inspection, Certification, and Training Services. Our national team of highly qualified, experienced, and competent trainers and engineers work closely with our customers to keep equipment and people both safe and compliant


Online Inspection Database

All of our Testing, Inspection, and Certification customers are automatically granted with access to our online inspection database to download examination reports for any equipment certified by Plant and Safety. Our inspection database runs on the industry leading ‘Motion Kinetic’ software



Get a Free Quote for your client today...

ACCREDITATIONS & MEMBERSHIPS

Plant and Safety Limited CHAS Accreditation
Plant and Safety Limited British Safety Council Membership
Plant and Safety Limited ROSPA Membership
NICEIC Approved Contractor

Plant and Safety Limited CHAS Premium Plus Accreditation
Plant and Safety Safecontractor and SafePQQ Accreditation

Plant and Safety NPORS Accreditation Approved Training Provider

CONTACT PLANT AND SAFETY LIMITED

T: 0330 113 7920

E: sales@plantandsafety.co.uk

Plant and Safety Ltd, Birmingham Road, Shenstone, Staffordshire, WS14 0LB

Plant Equipment Inspection, Excavator Inspection, Dumper Truck Inspection, Road Roller Inspection, Excavator LOLER Inspection. LOLER Plant Equipment, PUWER Plant Equipment, LOLER Inspection Plant Equipment, THorough Examination Plant Equipment, Thorough Examination Plant Equipment, Plant Equipment Thorough Examination, Excavator Thorough Examination, Excavator PUWER Inspection, Excavator LOLER Inspection, Hiab Inspection, Lorry Loader Inspection, Dumper Truck PUWER Inspection, LOLER Inspection Plant Equipment
